developers/coding_style/basics.title: Basics
developers/coding_style/basics.description: Having a consistent coding style is important for any project, especially with Serpent OS having a large codebase and numerous user facing tools.

developers/coding_style/exceptions.title: Exception handling
developers/coding_style/exceptions.description: Earlier in the project history, our code diverged significantly from the D standard library in how we handled runtime exceptions.

developers/coding_style/safe_d.title: @safe D
developers/coding_style/safe_d.description: The D language officially supports a so-called SafeD mode.

developers/coding_style/short_and_sweet.title: Short and sweet
developers/coding_style/short_and_sweet.description: We prefer to keep code short, elegant and easy to follow. Remember, Don't Repeat Yourself!
